name: Construction Products Association
goal:
The CPA is committed to raising the profile of the UK construction products industry and its members' businesses, helping grow the market and reducing regulatory risk. we represent our members across industry-wide organisations and alliances, whilst monitoring, supporting and lobbying government and public bodies in the UK and European Union to develop effective, evidence based policies and solutions.

We aim to provide our members with unequaled value and benefits. Whether assessing and interpreting policies and regulations, providing expert advice, leading work with members and the wider construction supply chain to create consensus or producing authoritative economic, technical and sustainability publications, we want to help our members be successful.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
